data.title: Physical Education Teacher - Elementary School in the Hamilton–Niagara Peninsula Region
data.meta_description: Find out what work is like for a Physical Education Teacher - Elementary School in the Hamilton–Niagara Peninsula Region. View job descriptions, duties, titles, and more. Visit Job Bank to learn about this occupation or for more information about the Canadian job market.
data.text:
Find out what work is like for a physical education teacher - elementary school in Canada. This work description is applicable to all Elementary school and kindergarten teachers (NOC 41221).

Elementary school and kindergarten teachers

Description

Elementary school and kindergarten teachers teach basic subjects such as reading, writing and arithmetic or specialized subjects such as English or French as a second language at public and private elementary schools.

Job duties

Here are some of the main activities and tasks that Elementary school and kindergarten teachers have to perform, and some of the physical demands they involve:

Prepare courses for presentation to students according to approved curriculum

Teach students using a systematic plan of lessons, discussions, audio-visual presentations and field trips

Lead students in activities to promote their physical, mental and social development and their school readiness

Assign and correct homework

Prepare, administer and correct tests

Evaluate the progress of students and discuss results with students, parents and school officials

Identify children's individual learning needs

Prepare and implement remedial programs for students requiring extra help

Participate in staff meetings, educational conferences and teacher training workshops

May supervise teachers' aides and student teachers.

Workplaces and employers

Here are the typical workplaces where Elementary school and kindergarten teachers are employed and some of their main characteristics:

Private elementary schools

Public elementary schools

Related job titles

Here are some other related job titles that are found in the same occupational category (NOC 41221), and a list of similar occupations:

French as a second language elementary school teacher
